name: NFT Rush with Billy
description:
Billy is you :)
This game is an infinite-runner nft collector and you can actually buy nft's with the tokens you collected. This game was made in less than 24 hours so expect bugs and it is for a game jam WHEN YOU ENTER THE GAME PLEASE PRESS "R" SO THE TOKENS CAN GET SAVED (SO YOU WON'T PLAY WITHOUT GETTING THE TOKENS)

PLEASE REPORT ANY SORT OF BUG
